installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Forge Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
function install_required {
  apk --no-cache --update add curl jq
}

function get_download {
    BASE_URL=${MODPACK_URL}/files
    ID=`curl -sl ${BASE_URL} | grep -i -A9 "${MODPACK_VERSION}" | grep -m 1 -oE 'href="[^\"]+"' | cut -d "/" -f6 | grep -oE [0-9]+`
    echo "ID: ${ID}"

    SECONDURL=${BASE_URL}/${ID}
    echo "SECONDURL: ${SECONDURL}"

    GOOD_ID=`curl -sl ${SECONDURL} | grep -i server | grep -i $MODPACK_VERSION | grep -Eo 'href="[^\"]+"' | grep -o -E "[0-9]+" | tail -1`
    if [ -z "$GOOD_ID" ]; then
        GOOD_ID=$ID
    fi
    echo "GOOD_ID: ${GOOD_ID}"

    DL_URL=${MODPACK_URL}/download/${GOOD_ID}/file
    echo "Download_URL: ${DL_URL}"

    cd /mnt/server

    echo "Executing curl -L ${DL_URL} -o server.zip"
    curl -L ${DL_URL} -o server.zip

    unzip -o server.zip

    rm -rf server.zip
}

function forge_install {
    echo -e "\nInstalling forge server using the installer jar file.\n"
    if [ -f /mnt/server/*installer.jar ]; then
        java -jar *installer.jar --installServer
    else
        echo "No forge installer found moving on."
    fi
}

function forge_cleanup {
    echo -e "\nDeleting installer jar file and cleaning up.\n"
    rm -rf *installer.jar
    if [ ! -f /mnt/server/*universal.jar ]; then
        mv -v /mnt/server/*/* /mnt/server/
        mv *universal.jar server.jar
    else
        mv *universal.jar server.jar
    fi
}

function json_download_prework {
   mkdir -p /mnt/server/mods
   cd /mnt/server/mods
}

function json_download_mods {
    MANIFEST=/mnt/server/manifest.json
    for mod in $(jq -c '.files[]' ${MANIFEST} ); do
        projID=$(echo $mod | jq -r ".projectID")
        fileID=$(echo $mod | jq -r ".fileID")
        URL="https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/${projID}/files/${fileID}/download"
        echo "mods file url: ${URL}"
        # this is saving everything as /mnt/server/mods/download
        FINAL_URL=$(curl $URL -s -L -o /dev/null -w '%{url_effective}')
        echo "Mod direct url: $FINAL_URL"
        curl -JLO ${FINAL_URL}
    done
}

function json_download_forge {
    cd /mnt/server
    FORGE=$(jq -r '.minecraft.modLoaders[0].id' /mnt/server/manifest.json | cut -d '-' -f2)
    MCVER=$(jq -r '.minecraft.version' /mnt/server/manifest.json)
	if [ ${MCVER} == "1.7.10" ] || [ ${MCVER} == "1.8.9" ]; then
		FORGE="${FORGE}-${MCVER}"
	fi
    FORGE_VERSION="${MCVER}-${FORGE}"
    
    echo -e "\nDownloading Forge Version $FORGE_VERSION\n"
    echo -r "running curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-installer.jar -o installer.jar \n"
    curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-installer.jar -o installer.jar
    echo -r "running curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-universal.jar -O \n"
    curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-universal.jar -O
    java -jar installer.jar --installServer
    mv *universal.jar server.jar
    rm installer.jar
}

function json_download_overrides {
    if [ -d /mnt/server/overrides ]; then
        mv /mnt/server/overrides/mods/* /mnt/server/mods/
        rmdir /mnt/server/overrides/mods
        mv /mnt/server/overrides/* /mnt/server
        rmdir /mnt/server/overrides
    fi
}

function cfg_download_forge {
    dos2unix settings.cfg # In case the pack was distributed with Windows-style line endings in the cfg file
    MCVER=`grep 'MCVER' settings.cfg | sed 's/;//g' | cut -d '=' -f 2-`
    FORGE=`grep 'FORGEVER' settings.cfg | sed 's/;//g' | cut -d '=' -f 2-`

	if [ ${MCVER} == "1.7.10" ] || [ ${MCVER} == "1.8.9" ]; then
		FORGE="${FORGE}-${MCVER}"
	fi
    
    FORGE_VERSION="${MCVER}-${FORGE}"
    echo -e ${FORGE_VERSION}
    
    echo -e "\nDownloading Forge Version $FORGE_VERSION\n"
    echo -r "running curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-installer.jar -o installer.jar \n"
    curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-installer.jar -o installer.jar
    echo -r "running curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-universal.jar -O \n"
    curl -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$FORGE_VERSION/forge-$FORGE_VERSION-universal.jar -O
    java -jar installer.jar --installServer
    mv *universal.jar server.jar
    rm installer.jar
}

install_required
get_download
if [ -f /mnt/server/manifest.json ]; then
    json_download_prework
    json_download_mods
    json_download_overrides
    json_download_forge
elif [ -f /mnt/server/settings.cfg ]; then
    cfg_download_forge
else
    forge_install
    forge_cleanup
fi
